WashingtonTeam.Name: Washington Football Team
WashingtonTeam.Description: The Washington Football Team  is a professional American Football team in the National Football League. The team was formerly known as the Washington Redskins.

WashingtonTeam.Name: Washington Capitals
WashingtonTeam.Description: The Washington Capitals are a professional ice hockey team in the National Hockey League. The team is nicknamed the Caps.

WashingtonTeam.Name: Washington Wizards
WashingtonTeam.Description: The Washington Wizards are a professional basketball team in the National Basketball Association. The team was formerly known as the Washington Bullets.

WashingtonTeam.Name: Washington Nationals
WashingtonTeam.Description: The Washington Nationals are a professional baseball team in the Major League Baseball. The team is nicknamed the Nats.

WashingtonTeam.Name: Washington Mystics
WashingtonTeam.Description: The Washington Mystics are a professional women's basketball team in the Woman's National Basketball Association. The team has only won 1 championship back in 2019.

WashingtonTeam.Name: D.C. United
WashingtonTeam.Description: The D.C. United are a professional soccer team in the Major League Soccer. The team won the very first championship when the MLS first started.
